Title: The Forbidden Note
Actors: Reese Scholtz, Reena Anjali, Umit Ulgen, Jonathan Hansler
Plot: Cosmo (Reese Scholtz), a South African pianist falls in love with Sakeena (Reena Anjali), a British Muslim ballerina, who is being forced into an arranged marriage by her abusive radicalized Uncle Jehandar (Umit Ulgen).
